runs.comm: Perera starts off with a wide, short and well down the leg side, England are away with an extra
fuller in length, on off stump, Trescothick defends it with full face of the bat back to bowler
extras again! full delivery down the leg side, clips the pads of Trescothick and rolls away to fine leg for couple of legbye
fuller in length, outside off, a hint of away movement, drives it to cover
fuller in length dowh the leg side, swinging in too, defended to cover
Bang! off the mark in style, short ball, Trescothick pulls it away well in front of square leg for four - that's the first scoring stroke off the bat for England
fuller in length and swings in, goes back to defend it and inside edge onto pads, Perera fields on his follow through
width outside off, short in length, Strauss cuts it to point off the backfoot
fuller in length, outside off, pushed to point
full and wide outside off and called a wide
good delivery, fuller in length, just outside off, Strauss goes for the big booming cover drive and is beaten by pace
fuller in length, on middle and leg stump, flicked away to deep midwicket for couple
again fuller in length, drives it with open face of the bat, good diving save by Dilshan at point
yorker, on target, Strauss digs it out back to bowler
good length ball, outside off, opens the face of the bat and runs it down to gully
good length ball, comes down the wicket to play a shot, balls hits the thigh pad and there's an appeal for lbw - rightly declined
good length ball, swings in, tries to force it off the back-foot, inner edge to leg side for a single
short in length, on leg stump, whipped off the pads to long leg for a single&
fuller in length, pitches on leg stump, swings further down, Perera hits the pad again and asks the question, the Umpire declines yet again
again fuller in length, on the leg stump, Strauss flicks it away off his pads to long leg for a single, there's a shie at the stumps, hits the stumps direct, the batsmen get an extra run
Great shot! full and fast outside off, Trecothick uses the pace of the ball, angles it to backward point for four
fuller in length, outside off, nicely driven to the extra cover fence for four
short and down leg, Strauss plays and misses
fuller in length, Strauss comes down the wicket and heaves it away to deep midwicket, one bounce over the fence for four
and again. fuller in length and angling in, Strauss comes down the wicket and drives it in the gap between mid-on and midwicket for four more
and again! thats three in a row - Superb shot! fuller in length, Strauss comes down the wicket and this time drives it through cover region for the third consecutive four
and again!! four in a row now - fuller in length and angling in, Strauss gives himself some room and drives it down the ground - beats Jayasuriya at mid-on and the ball races away to the boundary
slower ball, down the leg side, missed by Strauss - Sangakkara can't collect it neatly as well, the batsmen take two runs and its called wide as well - three runs in all
down the leg side, Strauss plays and misses
slower ball, outside off, tries to drive it on the up to off side, off the backfoot, mistimes it to mid-on
low full toss, pushed to mid-off for a single

short in length, Strauss punches it to cover off the backfoot, there's direct hit by cover fielder at the non-striker's end, appeal for run out, Television Umpire called in, but Strauss is way inside his ground
good length but wide of the off stump, Trescothick drives to the offside
short in length, outside off, guides it to third man
good length delivery outside off, Strauss drives it on the up and in the gap between mid-off and extra cover, the ball races away to the fence - that's four more to the total
driven to cover
short in length, outside off, enough room on offer and Strauss cuts it to backward point for four
driven down the ground to long-off for a single
short and wide outside off, Trescothick cuts it to deep cover
short in length, on leg stump, pulled away to long leg for one
short in length, outside off, Trescothick tries to steer it and gets beaten
short in length, outside off, Strauss comes forward and guides it to third man
low full toss, Trescothick drives it to deep cover for a single
Gone! full ball, on middle stump, Strauss tries to work it away on the on side, misses the line of the ball and ball hits the top of middle stump - England lose their first wicket here!
short in length, on leg stump, ball comes off the pads and rolls away on the leg side
short in length, outside off, cuts it to third man for a single
good length ball, on leg stump, tries to play it on the leg side, closes the face of the bat a little too early, ball comes off the leading edge and rolls away to cover
good length ball, outside off, Trescothick guides it to gully
short in length, outside off, guides it to third man
short of a length, just outside off, goes for the pull shot and gets beaten
slower ball, short in length, outside off, Pietersen pushes at it, ball comes off the edge - falls just short of Sangakkara behind the stumps
again on off stump, Trescothick taps it to cover with soft hands and takes a quick single
short in length, Pietersen punches it to cover for a single
fuller in length, on leg stump, turned to fine leg for a single
short in length, on leg stump, Trescothick turns it down to fine leg for a single
good length ball, Pietersen drives off the backfoot to long-on for a single
fuller in length on leg stump, turned to long leg, misfield there by Maharoof allows Trescothick to come back for the 2nd run
wide outside the off stump, Trescothick drives to cover off the front foot
down the leg side, Pietersen drives to mid off and takes a single
low full toss on the pads, KP drives it down to longon for a brace
good length ball, KP goes inside out and its mistimed hit to long-off, Perera loses it while the ball's in the middle of the lights - that's a big big let off by Sri Lanka
once again a miscued hit and this time fallen well short of cover
short in length, Trescothick comes down the wicket and cuts it to point
low full toss, on leg stump, looks like ball clips the pad on the way to keeper, appeal for lbw turned down - and its called a wide!
short of a good length, outside off, tries to work it down to third man, gets beaten
slower ball, outside off, cuts it to backward point and comes back for the 2nd run
short ball, Trescothick leaves it alone
arm ball, on leg stump, KP tries to play it on the leg side, off the pads to leg side
tossed up, KP uses his feet and adjusts his shot, its driven in the air to long-off, falls short of long-off fielder
short in length, Pietersen goes back and drives it down the ground to long-on
tossed up, KP uses his feet and chips it away to deep midwicket
tossed up by Jayasuriya, KP uses his feet, comes down the track and lofts it down between long-on and long-off for four
What a great catch by Malinga! short one from Jayasuriya, on leg stump, KP pulls it away nicely to long leg and Malinga at long leg dives full length and takes a blinder - that's a big wicket!
fuller in length, outside off, driven to deep cover
good length ball, comes down the wicket and guides it to third man
oh dear!! its a good length ball, outside off, Collingwood drives away from his body, getes a thick outside edge to point and Dilshan puts down a simple catch!
fuller in length, outside off, Collingwood opens the face of the bat and guides it to third man
slower ball, Collingwood comes down the wicket and drives it to long-off
fuller in length, Trescothick gives himself some room and drives it with open face of the bat, slices it up and over point for four, handy boundary for England
short in length, Collingwood goes back to play at it, gets a thick outside edge to gully
short in length, on leg stump, pushed to long-on
tossed up, outside off, Trescothick goes inside out and drives it to deep cover, comes back for a second run
well tossed up, outside off, Trescothick has a swipe at it and misses it - the ball just missed the top of off stump, good take by Sangakkara there
full ball, outside off, drives it to backward point for couple
flatter delivery, outside off, nicely played by Trescothick, used the pace of the ball, opens the face of the bat and guides to fine of the third man fence
short in length, outside off, Collingwood rocks back and guides it to short third man
tossed up, Trescothick tries his hand at the reverse sweep, ball comes off the inside edge and onto the pads
tossed up, Collingwood comes down the track and and tries to chip it over midwicket, fails to get enough elevation and Jayawardene takes a good catch at midwicket
short in length, pushed to point
arm ball, outside off, goes back to cut it, thick outside edge to keeper and Sangakkara dropped it
tossed up, on middle and leg stump, down on one knee and swept away to deep midwicket for four
short and wide outside off, Dalrymple cuts hard, gets a thick outside edge and its a good catch by Sangakkara
tossed up on leg stump, Trescothick goes down on one knee and sweeps it away over long leg fence for a six, good hit that by Trescothick!
faster ball, driven to long-on
driven to long-off
outside off and drives it to deep cover
fuller in length, outside off, Trescothick goes inside out and drives it wide of Fernando at long-off for four
fuller in length, on middle and leg stump, heaved away to midwicket, one bounce over the fence
again full ball, Trescothick stands tall and drives it over the top of the man at mid-on for four more
tossed up, driven to long-on for couple
tossed up, on leg stump, heaved away to deep midwicket for four more
tossed up, used his feet and driven to long-on for a single

Trescothick goes for the sweep shot this time, misses it and is hit on the pad, shout for lbw, declined, Trescothick wanted a single, takes off for one but is sent back, Sangakkara running in from behind the stumps, picks up and hit the stumps direct, Trescothick dives in, that looks close and the TV Umpire is called in to adjudicate - Trescothick is short of his ground and has to walk back.c
turns it down to fine leg and takes a couple - those are his first runs in international cricket
comes off the pads this time and rolls away on the offside, scamper through for a leg bye
short in length, on leg stump, turned to fine leg
full ball, yorker length, Jones digs it out to leg side for a single
dot ball!! oh my god! full delivery, and its driven straight back to bowler - that was a good stop by Fernando off his own bowling
short one this time from Fernando, pulled away to deep square leg - just a single.
fuller in length, on middle and leg stump, hits the pad and the batsman cross over for a legbye

Sri Lanka prevail!! length delivery from Fernando - no noball or wide - Bresnan goes for the big heave across the line, can only manage a top edge - ball balloons up in the air to fine leg - Bresnan and Jones complete two runs and that is all they will get
